wikipedia_page.main: Derek George Montague Gardner (13 February 1914 – 11 February 2007) was an English painter.  After a career as a civil engineer before and after serving in the Royal Navy in the Second World War, he became widely recognised as one of the leading English painters of marine subjects.

link_mentions.page: Arrow Emblem: Hawk of the Grand Prix
response: * The design of the 'Todoroki Special' was inspired by the 1976 Tyrrell P34 'six wheeler' designed by Derek Gardner.
Derek Gardner created a painting of her surrender to HMS Alfred.The Surrender of the 'Renommee' to the 'Alfred', 13 July 1796, Derek G. M. Gardner
